title: JUnit Platform Suite tests aren't executed in quarkus:dev/:test
body:
### Describe the bug

When running the `quarkus:dev` or `:test` mode with the `junit-platform-suite`, no tests are found or executed, no matter which configuration I've tried so far.



### Expected behavior

That suites can be executed with the `junit-platform-suite` test engine in the same way as in the IDE. I want to group tests in an esay way, without tagging every class and also without writing the exclude/include regex patterns.

### Actual behavior

No tests are founds

### How to Reproduce?

Example project: https://github.com/sdaschner/quarkus-playground/tree/quarkus-junit-suite

Run the following:

```
git clone --branch quarkus-junit-suite https://github.com/sdaschner/quarkus-playground
cd quarkus-playground/
mvn quarkus:dev -Dquarkus.test.exclude-pattern='' -Dquarkus.test.include-engines='junit-platform-suite'
Press 'o' and 'r'
```
